column4: my samba has completely stopped working. i get a cryptic error similar to this http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=10057491&postcount=1
i've had zero luck fixing it, i'm assuming it's some screwed permissions somewhere
does /etc/samba/smb.conf exist, is it readable, does /etc/samba/ have reasonable looking perms as well?
it didnt, i copied the sample from my /usr, relogged, and now its gone again apparently
